Text:

Hello!  Thank for you contribution and the AVS audio converter torrent.  I'm not a pc techie, and I have not been able to install this program.  I was able to unzip and unrar (1 folder) but couldn't figure out what to do next re: Installation?  Any help or pointers would be appreciated, thanks.
Solved the problem myself.  My RAR program was obsolete, So downloaded WinRar from CNET and got the program up and running.  Great simple program, works fine. Thanks for the contribution.

Works perfect. Installed in 1 minute with all the unraring issues. Actually no unraring issues whatsoever. Good job MAFIAA.
